import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Navigation } from 'fannypack/Navigation';
import { List } from 'fannypack/List';
import { Link } from 'fannypack/Link';

# Navigation

## Import

```jsx
import { Navigation } from 'fannypack'
```

## Usage

```jsx-live
<Navigation aria-label="External links">
  <List>
    <List.Item>
      <Link href="https://google.com">Google</Link>
    </List.Item>
    <List.Item>
      <Link href="https://github.com">GitHub</Link>
    </List.Item>
  </List>
</Navigation>
```

## Theming

<Theme
  component={Navigation}
  overrides={['Navigation.css.root']}>
  <List><List.Item><Link href="https://google.com">Google</Link></List.Item><List.Item><Link href="https://github.com">GitHub</Link></List.Item></List>
</Theme>
